Sentencas: Fuel composition fluctuation could result in operation performance degradation caused by a potential failure of component or system.
Titulo: Effect of fuel composition fluctuation on the safety performance of an IT-SOFC/GT hybrid system

Sentencas: Therefore, this work elaborated the safe characteristic and load performance of an intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell (IT-SOFC) and gas turbine (GT) hybrid system using gasified biomass gas when the composition fluctuates.
Titulo: Effect of fuel composition fluctuation on the safety performance of an IT-SOFC/GT hybrid system

Sentencas: The malfunction restrictions of components (such as fuel cell thermal crack, compressor surge, reformer carbon deposition) were considered in this research.
Titulo: Effect of fuel composition fluctuation on the safety performance of an IT-SOFC/GT hybrid system

Sentencas: Results show that the hybrid system has a high efficiency 60.78% at the design point using gasified wood chip gas, which is a useful reference for small distributed power stations.
Titulo: Effect of fuel composition fluctuation on the safety performance of an IT-SOFC/GT hybrid system

Sentencas: H-2 concentration variation is the most influential factor to the hybrid system output power and efficiency, followed by CH4, and then CO.
Titulo: Effect of fuel composition fluctuation on the safety performance of an IT-SOFC/GT hybrid system

Sentencas: System efficiency increases significantly with H-2 concentration increase, while decrease slightly with CO and CH4 increase.
Titulo: Effect of fuel composition fluctuation on the safety performance of an IT-SOFC/GT hybrid system

Sentencas: For the system safety operation: i) when the H-2 and CH4 fluctuates to relative proportion 90% and 97%, respectively, the reformer will suffer from the potential failure of carbon deposition; ii) when H-2 increases to 116%, the TIT exceeds the upper limit 1223 K, which causes the turbine blade to burn down because of over temperature.
Titulo: Effect of fuel composition fluctuation on the safety performance of an IT-SOFC/GT hybrid system

Sentencas: For the effect of water variation, the system output power and efficiency will be improved with water reduction, and the efficiency can even reach up to 64.85%.
Titulo: Effect of fuel composition fluctuation on the safety performance of an IT-SOFC/GT hybrid system

Sentencas: However, the reformer can't work safely due to the severe shortage of water for the reforming reactions.
Titulo: Effect of fuel composition fluctuation on the safety performance of an IT-SOFC/GT hybrid system
